data.message:
I was just introduced to this guy a little over a month ago. Though I have never met him for real, I did meet him in a place
between heaven and earth. I like to call it Gem City. I dreamed of this time...it started with blowing out a candle...his friends hating me before he and I ever met. I remember thinking his name was different. I get this feeling that i have loved him for a thousand years and will love him a thousand more. Like a match
made in heaven..

It is sort of like i have my personal stan!! He pursued me in a very unconventional way. I did not see it coming, he is in my head. He knows my every move. He helped me turn my life right side up. He is an amazingly powerful man full of the Light of God and although i am in awe of his person all i want to do is hear his voice. It is that simple. When i finally do hear it, I will be space bound...
